author: reidak49
title: good
review: nice set this is like other hockey sets it is all thecnic pieces and push the head down an it launches the puck and i dont like that this set has no arms but there are two usefull bionicle pieces and the container can turn into a water bottle

author: SaintElsewhere
title: Ugh. No thanks.
review:
First of all, I have never, despite being Canadian, been a hockey fan. The only reason that I kept this was that it was a gift. Not to mention the water bottle container. Quite frankly, the water bottle is the only thing that saves this from a rating of 1/5. 

Pros:
water bottle

Cons:
these sets don't work on their own
not enough pieces
interchangeable masks may seem like a good idea, but they're just strange when you look at them
stick function isn't that good

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Sports (Hockey) - Slammer Goalie Review
review:
This figure is a good figure to have. It may doesn't have a lot of play features but the figure is very easy to maneuver and to build. We also get a few stickers in this set. The helmet can be pushed down if you want to move the hockey stick which can shoot the puck. It's a good set to play with and it's also good for pieces which you can use for some future MOC's (My own creations) and/or brickfilms as well. What's also interesting about this set is that you can use the canister as a bottle if you want.

All in all this set is an good set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
